summary.span: 显示要在 控件中使用的复选框用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Displays a check box user interface (UI) to use in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一种专用类型， 用于显示通过复选框 UI 显示的二进制或三元信息。The class is a specialized type of used to display binary or ternary information presented through a check box UI. 在默认的二进制模式下，单元可以包含或的 `true` 值 `false` 。In the default binary mode, the cells can hold values of `true` or `false`. 在三元模式下，单元采用 值之一。In ternary mode, the cells take on one of the values. 属性确定二进制或三元模式是否有效。The property determines whether binary or ternary mode is in effect. 是专用于保存此类型的单元格的列类型。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下， 初始化为新的 。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在现有的后面对列中的单元格进行样式 设置，请将列的 属性设置为要用作模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 此列的单元格相关属性是模板单元的名称相同的属性的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元的属性值将仅影响基于更改后添加的模板的单元格。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 但是，更改列的单元格相关属性值将更新列中的模板单元和所有其他单元，并在必要时刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. 如果当前单元格为 ，则 属性始终为 `true` 。When the current cell is a , the property is always `true`. 通常，复选框单元值适用于存储（如任何其他数据）或用于执行批量操作。Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations. 如果希望在用户单击复选框单元时立即做出响应，可以处理 事件，但此事件发生在更新单元格值之前。If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated. 如果在单击时需要新值，一个选项是根据当前值计算预期值的值。If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value. 另一种方法是立即提交更改，并处理 事件以响应事件。Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the event to respond to it. 若要在单击单元格时提交更改，则必须处理 事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格为复选框单元，则调用 方法并传入 值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 跟踪办公室中的雇员。The following code example uses a to track which employees are in the office. 列由 对象组成。The column is made up of objects. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 基础数据源中出现时，、和属性将确定这些状态的关联值。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 设置 所属列的属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将 "turnedOff" 与相关联 `false` ， 属性将 "turnedOn" 与相关联 `true` ，并且 属性将 "unknown" 关联到不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件调用此方法以将单元值转换为属性指示的类型的等效显示值 。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控件在参数中将单元值传递到此方法 `value` 。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 此方法首先尝试 `value` 使用、和属性将其转换为或值 （ 如果已设置）。This method first attempts to convert `value` to a or value using the , , and properties if they have been set. 如果转换失败，则 会发生该事件。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the event occurs. 如果此事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序将属性设置 为 `true` ，则会引发异常。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果转换成功或事件有处理程序， 并且未将 属性设置为 `true` ，则 会发生该事件。If the conversion is successful or there is a handler for the event and it does not set the property to `true`, the event occurs. 事件处理程序可以修改 `value` 和 `cellStyle` 。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 但是，如果处理程序未将 属性设置为 `true` ，则此方法 `value` 使用对象的格式设置属性 `cellStyle` 。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 这可能会导致其他 事件。This can result in an additional event. 如果格式化成功并且 `context` 参数值包含 值，则此方法将返回 格式化值的版本，以便将其复制到剪贴板。If formatting is successful and the `context` parameter value includes the value, this method returns the version of the formatted value for copying to the Clipboard. 否则，此方法将返回在控件中显示的格式化值 。Otherwise, this method returns the formatted value for display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三元模式下的第三种状态通常表示未初始化或不确定的值。The third state in ternary mode typically represents an uninitialized or indeterminate value. 设置 所属列的属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 与 column 属性不同， 当您更改单元格的值时，它不会自动更新相关联的单元格样式的属性。Unlike the column property, the cell property does not automatically update the property of the associated cell style when you change its value. 将单元 属性值更改为时 `true` ，请确保将 属性返回的对象的属性设置 为 。When you change the cell property value to `true`, be sure to set the property of the object returned by the property to . 将 属性值更改为时 `false` ，请确保将 属性设置为 `false` 。When you change the property value to `false`, be sure to set the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将 "turnedOff" 与相关联 `false` ， 属性将 "turnedOn" 与相关联 `true` ，并且 属性将 "unknown" 关联到不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 尚未设置单元格的属性，则 使用所属的属性 （如果该列存在）。If the property of the cell has not been set, then the property for the owning is used, if the column exists. 如果不存在所属列，则将此属性设置为适用于其模式的默认类型： 对于二进制模式和三元模式，此属性设置为 。If no owning column exists, then this property is set to the default type appropriate for its mode: for binary mode and for ternary mode. 是单元格中包含的实际数据对象，而 属性是此对象的格式化表示形式。The is the actual data object contained in the cell, whereas the property is the formatted representation of this object. 和 属性分别对应于这些值的数据类型。The and properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
